metadata.name: Face of Monkey King
metadata.description:
The Monkey King, known as Sun Wukong (孫悟空) in Chinese, is a legendary mythical figure best known as one of the main characters in the 16th-century Chinese 
novel Journey to the West (西遊記) and many later stories and adaptations. 

In Journey to the West, Sun Wukong is a monkey born from a stone who acquires supernatural powers through Taoist practices.
------------------------------------------------------------

In the Peking Opera, painted faces and elaborate costumes are crucial parts of the overall performance. 
Facial expression plays an important role to the character's personality.  Mischievous, boastful, clumsy, 
but also loyal, brave and cunning, the Monkey King with his magic staff.

-------------------------------------------------------------

The collector for this NFT would receive a right-in-your-face 1700px X 1700px high resolution movie file. Please notify the artist after purchase.
